item.description:
Are you an entrepreneur who wants to produce a groundbreaking mobile app? Are you a developer who need the right business partner to launch your product? Join EFactor for an AT&T Hackathon event that will bring these two worlds together. This is the first of three events presented by EFactor, AT&T, and MassChallenge that will run from Thursday Nov 17th to Saturday Nov 19th. Join EFactor on Thursday night to learn about the mobile app industry from Greg Raiz the founder of Raizlabs, Matt Gross the founder of Mobile Monday Boston, and Dave Bisceglia the Co-Founder and CEO of The Tap Lab. You will have a chance to network with participating entrepreneurs & developers, find the right partners & build you team, and start working on that mobile app you've been dreaming about! 

Join our panel of experts to discuss: 
* What are the very first steps to creating a mobile app? 
* How to evaluate if your idea has a great business potential? 
* How to find the right developers, or business partners? 
* How to market your app? 
* Networking hour will be held at the beginning and end of the event 
* Food & drinks will be served 
* Tickets are $15 online, or $ 20 at the door. Hurry and save $5! 
Registration & information

***Students get 25% discount through EFactor EDU, where students can find international internships and build their startup! Student registration
item.name: Mobile App Accelerant
